comments:
"Barrieretest.at" is still in early stages, and the LLM-based analysis is consistently being improved by adding better prompts and using better models, as they become available.

In the future, the tool will also add optional LLM-based improvements if the user requests help with implementing fixes to the problems the automated tests find.
features: "Barrieretest.at" is a tool targeting the Austrian market for quick, automated accessibility testing. It calculates a score based on automated testing with pa11y, and provides additional results through an LLM-based site analysis, checking for things that automated tools usually miss.
title: Barrieretest.at
